channel.title: Declaring
channel.description:
I'm sort of new to coding and what not with Java. I'm currently learning how to code so don't flame me! XD Anyways... I've read through a whole bunch of tutorials and constenly making my server better and better (Thanks you guys! -.^) , and I've come to a stopping point everytime someone says to declare something... Like I said, I'm sort of new to coding with Java stuff and I'd REALLY appreciate an answer to my question (below):
How do I declare? If It's not a "How" thing, what do I do to declare soemthing?
NOTE: If I'm in violation of any rules, please post them so I don't get in troubel! ^^
~Your newset member, Hale

item.title: Declaring
item.dc:creator: @haleistheman haleistheman
item.description:
@haleistheman wrote:

That kinda helped me… I just can’t find a requested sticky… ^^
